WAF - Identifying the level of protection required for applications

Version notice:

Create WAF logging profileÂ¶

You will begin by creating a logging profile to associated with WAF policies to log all incoming requests. In a production environment this would lead to information overload, but for the lab environment will be used for informational purposes.

  1. Select Security->Event Logs->Logging Profiles then click Create

  2. For Profile Name enter waf_log

  3. Select the Application Security, Dos Protection, and Bot Defense checkboxes

  4. On the Application Security tab, for Request Type select All requests

  5. On the DoS Protection tab select the Local Publisher checkbox

  6. On the Bot Defense tab select all the checkboxes in the Log Requests by Classification. In Log Requests by Mitigation Action select Alarm, CAPTCHA and Block.

  7. Click Create and you should see a waf_log in the Logging Profiles
